actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an election for income from certain spacecraft to be treated as income from sources within the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat income from certain spacecraft as income from sources within the United States, for purposes of the income tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an election for income from certain spacecraft to be treated as income from sources within the United States.
